verses.roman:
ācārya milite tabe gelā jagadānanda
jagadānande pāñā haila ācārya ānanda

synonyms: ācārya milite—to meet Advaita Ācārya; tabe—thereafter; gelā—went; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda; jagadānande pāñā—getting Jagadānanda; haila—became; ācārya—Advaita Ācārya; ānanda—very happy.
translation: Jagadānanda Paṇḍita thereafter went to meet Advaita Ācārya, who also was very happy to have him.
